column4: Praying for a swift recovery for our President @realDonaldTrump, @FLOTUS and everyone fighting #coronavirus.

Our Nation loses 22 Veterans every day to suicide. Thank you, @realDonaldTrump, for honoring Terry and his mission. https://t.co/TEFFVG05Fk

Over 5,000 constituents joined my Tele-Town Hall. We discussed important issues like schools reopening, the next round of federal COVID-19 assistance, and the recent events in Portland. If you were unable to join, here’s a full recording of the call. https://t.co/kdHF6BvSh0

The current science is squarely in the corner of schools reopening this fall. Our children can’t be locked out of the classroom and destined for home confinement based on politics and unfounded claims that reopening schools puts the health of our communities at increased risk.

A study conducted by a University of Wisconsin health researcher on 3,000 students found that 65% reported anxiety symptoms and 68% reported mild to severe depression during the Spring 2020 school closure due to COVID-19. https://t.co/vAOX7L8QBc

The Public Health Agency of Sweden, and the Finnish Institute for Health and Welfare, found that through contact tracings in primary schools, hardly any evidence exists of children infecting others. https://t.co/PEfjm07PnG
Germany’s largest study to date on schoolchildren concluded that they don’t play a major role in spreading COVID-19; instead “children act more as a brake on infection” https://t.co/1siy9EWiiG
Republicans are working to move our Nation forward. We’ll continue to support our healthcare system, while helping our businesses reopen and our students return to school. https://t.co/ufBw8GIkPN

.@realDonaldTrump is supporting all Pennsylvanians during the outbreak of #COVID19. 

- 2.6M N-95 masks

Last month, 20.5 million Americans lost their jobs. Since the start of #COVID19, 33.3 million Americans have filed for unemployment. Our families and communities are hurting - bad. With precaution, we must start moving forward and getting back to work.

On this #NationalDayOfPrayer, we continue to seek guidance from God – especially in these times of challenge and strife. We pray for the souls lost to sickness, and all on the frontlines of the battle against those who wish to do us harm. May God continue to bless and keep you.
